name: The Deep Dreaming
description:
This Lovecraftian and Weirdcore-inspired roguelike was made in 7 days for the 7DRL Challenge of 2022.

Explore the weirdest and scariest side of the subconscious, and choose your fate with your actions in this multiple-ended game, with voice-acted characters talking to you and trying to convince you to join their cause.

Play it with the mouse and 'WASD' (or the Arrow Keys) and remember: "each time we talk, a message hides, in big letters right in front of your eyes".
